perms.embed_links: This is needed to send embeds

perms.manage_messages: Needed to delete messages after they character and allow edits when a message didn't character.

perms.read_message_history: This is needed to edit/delete messages
perms.send_messages: If you or me can't send messages, my webhooks won't either.
perms.send_messages_in_threads: Same goes here, but for threads.

afk_schedule.commands_description: Commands for checking an AFK schedule

Bug.Name: Bug
Bug.MaxEffect: Decreases the Special Attack of the target and its allies by one stage.

Dark.Name: Dark
Dark.MaxEffect: Decreases the Special Defense of the target and its allies by one stage.

Dragon.Name: Dragon
Dragon.MaxEffect: Decreases the Attack of the target and its allies by one stage.

Electric.Name: Electric
Electric.MaxEffect: Creates Electric Terrain for five turns.

Fairy.Name: Fairy
Fairy.MaxEffect: Creates Misty Terrain for five turns.

Fighting.Name: Fighting
Fighting.MaxEffect: Increases the Attack of the user and its allies by one stage.

Fire.Name: Fire
Fire.MaxEffect: Creates harsh sunlight for five turns.

Flying.Name: Flying
Flying.MaxEffect: Increases the Speed of the user and its allies by one stage.

Ghost.Name: Ghost
Ghost.MaxEffect: Decreases the Defense of the target and its allies by one stage.

Grass.Name: Grass
Grass.MaxEffect: Creates Grassy Terrain for five turns.

Ground.Name: Ground
Ground.MaxEffect: Increases the Special Defense of the user and its allies by one stage

Normal.Name: Normal
Normal.MaxEffect: Decreases the Speed of the target and its allies by one stage.

Poison.Name: Poison
Poison.MaxEffect: Increases the Special Attack of the user and its allies by one stage.

Psychic.Name: Psychic
Psychic.MaxEffect: Creates Psychic Terrain for five turns.

Rock.Name: Rock
Rock.MaxEffect: Creates a sandstorm for five turns.

Steel.Name: Steel
Steel.MaxEffect: Increases the Defense of the user and its allies by one stage.

Z-Effect.Long: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage
Raises the user's Attack by 3 stage
Raises the user's Attack by 2 stage, calls a Z Move
Raises Speed by 2 stages, calls a Z-move
Raises accuracy by 1 stage, calls a Z-move
Raises Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by 1 stage

Fully restores user's HP (Ghost-type)
Raises Attack by 1 stage (non Ghost-type)

Accuracy.False: Bypasses accuracy checks to always hit

PP.False: It's a gimmick move, therefore PP is not used

Stat.All: {{chance}}% for ATK{{stages:+}}, DEF{{stages:+}}, SPA{{stages:+}}, SPD{{stages:+}}, SPE{{stages:+}}

Target: May affect anyone adjacent to the user
May affect the user or an adjacent ally
May affect any adjacent foe, but not allies
Affects all Pokémon adjacent to the user
Affects all adjactent foes but not allies
Affects the user and all allies
ffects all Pokemon on the field
After is finished, the user becomes confused due to fatigue
Affects all Pokémon on the field
Affects the user's side and all allies
Increased damage dealt by the foe's last attack

Flag.DistanceTriple: Can hit a target using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Shadow Force, Sky Drop, or Sky Uppercut
Flag.FailSkyBattle: Fails if used in a Sky Battle
Flag.FailEncore: Fails if the target is already under an Encore effect
Flag.FailMeFirst: Fails if the target is already under a Me First effect
Flag.Pressure: May cause wild pokemon to call for help
Flag.Combo: Can be used in a combo
Flag.NoSleepTalk: Can't be used by Sleep Talk
Flag.FailCopycat: Fails if the target is already under a Copycat effect
Flag.FailMimic: Fails if the target is already under a Mimic effect
Flag.FailInstruct: Fails if the target is already under an Instruct effect
Flag.NoMultiHit: Can't be used in a multi-hit combo
Flag.CantUseTwice: Can't be used twice in a row

Inflict.9: A sleeper loses 1/4 HP every turn
Inflict.12: It enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move successively
Inflict.14: Makes the target yawn and fall asleep next turn
Inflict.15: Prevents the foe from using any HP-recovery moves for five turns
Inflict.17: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move
Inflict.18: {{chance}}% to steal some HP from the target every turn
Inflict.19: It prevents the foe from using its held item
Inflict.20: Both user and foe faint in 3 turns
Inflict.21: Lays roots that restore HP. The user can't switch out
Inflict.24: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns
Inflict.42: The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves
Inflict.46: Inflicts 1/8 of the target's maximum HP (1/4 if Steel or Water type) as damage per turn
Inflict.47: {{chance}}% to either poison the target, paralyze it, or make it drowsy
